column4: hi all, im complete noob and first time in my life using linux, so i need step-by-step help with qtsim instalation
hi all, im complete noob and first time in my life using linux, so i need step-by-step help with qtsim instalation... Would someone be so kind to guide me trough instalation?
sudo apt-get install build-essential    mkdir qtsim    svn co https://speedsim.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/speedsim/QtSim/trunk qtsim    cd *    ./configure   and see which libraries are missing
also  svn co https://speedsim.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/speedsim/SpeedKernel SpeedKernel  as the site says, after  mkdir qtsim
